tags.name: img-view-modal
tags.description:
`img-view-modal`
Layers images over each other with a slider interface to compare them

Attributes:

  * `title` {`string`} - Title

  * `top-src` {`string`} - src for top image

  * `bottom-src` {`string`} - src for top image

  * `opacity` {`boolean`} - mode for the slider: wipe

Properties:

  * `title` {`string`} - Title

  * `topSrc` {`string`} - src for top image

  * `bottomSrc` {`string`} - src for top image

  * `opacity` {`boolean`} - mode for the slider: wipe

attributes.name: top-src
attributes.description:
`top-src` {`string`} - src for top image

Property: topSrc

attributes.name: bottom-src
attributes.description:
`bottom-src` {`string`} - src for top image

Property: bottomSrc

attributes.name: opacity
attributes.description:
`opacity` {`boolean`} - mode for the slider: wipe

Property: opacity

Default: false
